ygData.subject: Re: Staff of Writhing
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a RTS and the skull, what is the 3rd component to make, or is it some kinds quest you must do? +                        +                    (o o)
ygData.messageBody:
I have a RTS and the skull, what is the 3rd component to make, or is it some
kinds quest you must do?

----- Original Message -----
From: James Leavings <argynt@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, January 02, 1997 1:48 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Off Topic: King Ak'anon


> From: "James Leavings" <argynt@...>
>
> To the best of my understanding, the Priest has a Staff of Writhing.
It
> is a staff you can get in game, but is not made like that. The 2 Items in
> question are the Runed Totem Staff, and the Skull of Jen Tra. I may have
> pelled it wrong, but them's the stuff!
> Argynte
> -----Original Message-----
> From: DBellassai@... <DBellassai@...>
> To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>

> Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Off Topic: King Ak'anon

he

> say,

> thought

other

tried
> to
> >combine the skull and rune totum staff and it tells me that they dont
